meanings.definition: To analyze too much or too deeply.
meanings.sent1: She tends to overanalyse every text message she receives.
meanings.sent2: It's easy to overanalyse situations and make them more complicated than they are.
meanings.sent3: He overanalysed the joke so much that he missed the punchline.
meanings.sent4: Don't overanalyse the painting; sometimes art is meant to be felt, not understood.
meanings.sent5: Try not to overanalyse every decision you make; sometimes it's best to go with your gut feeling.

meanings.definition: To examine or consider something in too much detail.
meanings.sent1: I tend to overanalyse my mistakes and dwell on them for too long.
meanings.sent2: It's important not to overanalyse every word someone says and read too much into it.
meanings.sent3: She overanalysed the recipe so much that she ended up burning the dish.
meanings.sent4: Sometimes it's better to trust your instincts rather than overanalysing every situation.
meanings.sent5: Don't overanalyse every email you receive; sometimes a quick response is all that's needed.
